nodes.text: Level 3321 was a level on the ecumenopolis planet of Coruscant, capital of the Galactic Republic. In the C.R.C. year 7942, the spice dealer Tach Drud operated a spice den out of a curio shop on Level 3321.

Level 3321 was first mentioned in the canon reference book Star Wars: Scum and Villainy: Case Files on the Galaxy's Most Notorious, which was written by Pablo Hidalgo and published in 2018. The book includes an illustration of Drud's spice den on Level 3321, which was illustrated by Gunship Revolution.
